Package files

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionController
    Controls all ActionEvents fired from all buttons in the program.
    ButtonMaker
    Easily creates buttons with predefined settings and sets the icons
    CreditsScreen
    Displays the credits
    FadingClown
    This class is displays a clown image that slowly fades in then out.
    GameScreen
    JPanel that holds and controls the PauseMenu, SidePanel, and LaserGrid
    GenerateTableImages
    Sets up the highscores table and saves the images to give to other objects to display.
    Help
    The help screen.
    HighScoresScreen
    The screen to display all highscores
    ImageLoader
    Class to generate images and imageicons, and inputstreams.
    LaserButton
    The button that holds the images of mirrors, blocks, and laser animations
    LaserGrid
    This class contains and draws the grid for the laser game.
    LevelCompleteScreen
    The screen that is shown when the user completes a level.
    LevelSelect
    The level select screen.
    Main
    Sets up the splash screen and loads the program.
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu screen.
    PanelTimer
    This class contains the timer for the game.
    PauseMenu
    PauseMenu that fades in.
    SidePanel
    Holds the timer, go, and pause buttons
    SplashScreen
    The screen that displays a animation of a lazer hitting mirrors, displaying the company logo
    TableViewer
    Displays the scorebox
    WinScreen
    Displays the Win animation
